CatDescriptText: Cutline of possible related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 14, 1953, pg. 23, reads: "HURRICANE - Pittsburghers and out-of-towners alike flocked to the grand opening Monday of the new Hurricane Club at 1603 Centre Avenue. This Exquisite addition to Pittsburgh's night spots lays claim to being one of the most modern restaurant - bars for many miles around... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of man standing between two women wearing dark suits, at bar with ashtrays and drinks, possibly at opening night of Hurricane Club
